title: Objective Morality with Esther O'Reilly and Tripp Parker
description:
Esther recently finished her math Ph.D. and now spends her time freelance writing and getting into arguments on Twitter, while Tripp works for Amazon and solves all Bill Gates's problems.

Recent articles by Esther discussed in this convo... 
https://www.spectator.co.uk/article/richard-dawkins-views-on-down-s-syndrome-aren-t-a-surprise
https://estheroreilly.substack.com/p/what-we-cant-not-know
https://estheroreilly.substack.com/p/objective-morality-a-tom-holland

Esther on the channel: https://youtu.be/sOT6cP9tEnQ, and https://youtu.be/QR_kwzF-9Ys and https://youtu.be/sANRgWpXvTI

Tripp on the Channel: https://youtu.be/P2Wh1pG0EH8

Join our Discord community: https://discord.gg/YXVaWmhE
